title: Ticket #7321: add a command to the master to test preen
description:
In order to test preen, we need to be able to force it to run on command. The easy way to do this would be to add preen as an option to the DAEMON_ON command, and modify the generic tool to be able to send this option.

so running 

condor_on -preen
would cause the master to run preen immediately. A test could then create some bogus files in spool or log, etc, force preen to run, and look to see that those files were cleaned up and that no other files were cleaned up.

Having preen write to a log file and not just to stdout/stderr would be helpful also.
